title.narrative: Palestinian Belgium Study, Consultancy and Expertise Fund

description.narrative:
The Study Fund finances, in whole or in part, studies, consultancies and expertise in support of the Palestinian ministries, governmental and semi-governmental bodies. Within this context, the Fund supports -in addition to other fields- the current priority sectors of the Palestinian-Belgian cooperation program: education and local governance as well as the strategic analysis of future priority sectors including development priorities. The capacity and institutional building of the Ministry of Finance and Planning is given special attention under the Fund.
In order to promote harmonization of the aid and ensure complementarity, the activities under the Fund are, wherever possible, implemented by the Palestinian beneficiaries with the involvement of the private sector, academic institutions and in cooperation with other donors. Results of studies are normally disseminated through workshops organized by the beneficiaries with the participation of the private sector, NGOs and the donor community.

participating-org.narrative: Directorate-general Development Cooperation and Humanitarian Aid
